series_description: This series documents the direct sales of wine and beer by licensed wineries and breweries to personal consumers within the commonwealth, and the shipment of those sales by common carriers. This series may include, but is not limited to: forms, reports, and correspondence
retention_statement: 2 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents the approval of the labels affixed to malt, and cider products sold and distributed in the commonwealth. This series includes, but is not limited to: applications, forms, label images, certifications, and correspondence
retention_statement: 2 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_title: Wine and Malt Beverage Excise Taxes
series_description: This series documents the monitoring of monthly purchases, transfers, and inventory of wine and malt beverage manufacturers/wholesalers and remitted excise taxes. This series may include, but is not limited to: reports, purchase orders, invoices, transfers, and correspondence
retention_statement: 2 Years after end of state fiscal year
